Author: Moderator
Message: Hello david_r.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: david_r
Message: My pleasure

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: david_r
Message: Sure.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: david_r
Message: Yes, I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: david_r
Message: Okay.

Author: david_r
Message: Hello, Andrew.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: david_r
Message: I'm doing alright. Yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm quite good. What are you up to?

Author: david_r
Message: Procrastinating... I'm supposed to be doing some work but I'm way too lazy right now.

Author: Andrew
Message: I know the feeling very well believe me. What kind of work do you have to do?

Author: david_r
Message: I'm helping out the local synagogue with their website... it's just a side gig.

Author: Andrew
Message: I take it you're in IT? Or do you just make websites for fun?

Author: david_r
Message: I am in IT, but in a different field. I'm not really a professional web designer.

Author: Andrew
Message: I see. In which field are you?

Author: david_r
Message: I am a computational linguist. How about you? What do you do for a living?

Author: Andrew
Message: At the moment I study Biology. I don't actually have a job, other than the one I use to pay the tuition fees.

Author: david_r
Message: Which is..?

Author: Andrew
Message: Working at the university's KFC.

Author: david_r
Message: You must be sick and tired of chicken!

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm mostly sick and tired of customers to be honest.

Author: david_r
Message: What annoys you most in customer service?

Author: Andrew
Message: When they start randomly harassing you for not being fast enough. Fortunately students are not the most annoying customers.

Author: david_r
Message: Okay, I'll bite. Who are the worst ones?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not sure actually. Being within the university's walls, I don't see many others. It's just that it could be worse.

Author: david_r
Message: Is this your first ever job?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yup, it is.

Author: david_r
Message: What are you interested in within the field of biology? Lots of interesting stuff there.

Author: Andrew
Message: Definitely. Mostly trying to figure out how the brain works. Basically everything related to neurology.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: david_r
Message: I think it was a human, but to be honest I'll need the second actor to be sure.

Author: Andrew
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin, and you'll have 15 minutes maximum after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: david_r
Message: Hey, Andrew.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: david_r
Message: I'm doing just fine. Yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright. What's up?

Author: david_r
Message: Just avoiding doing some work... nothing major.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sounds like procrastinating. I know the feeling.

Author: david_r
Message: It's been a long day, I just want to kick back and not really do much.

Author: Andrew
Message: Just a boring day or have you been busy?

Author: david_r
Message: Work has been murder. Loads of stuff to do, not nearly enough time or people.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I see. What kind of work is it?

Author: david_r
Message: I'm a linguist.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh that sounds really cool! What kind of linguist?

Author: david_r
Message: By training I'm a historical linguist, but I actually mostly work natural language understanding.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sounds like we'd have things to talk about then. I want to study the brain and the cognitive processes underlying behaviors.

Author: david_r
Message: That's definitely fascinating. I have only a tangential understanding of this stuff. You are the future, mate.

Author: Andrew
Message: Both of us then. Especially about language understanding.

Author: david_r
Message: There's lots of work to be done, still. Which is good, since I don't want to be out of a job.

Author: Andrew
Message: It's a good thing that it's very demanded lately. Neither do I.

Author: david_r
Message: Do you see yourself in academia? Or making a career in a corporation?

Author: Andrew
Message: Maybe corporation and academia. They are not mutually exclusive.

Author: david_r
Message: I find it a little dodgy when people do both. It's not really good for academia, in my opinion.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sometimes they have partnerships.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: david_r
Message: Okay.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: david_r
Message: I still think that was the human.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how comfident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments, feel free to share them here, otherwise you can close this window.

Author: david_r
Message: Cool, my pleasure. Best of luck with the study, and cheers.
